inclusion.criterion: Impaired glucose tolerance or CFRD defined as fasting blood glucose (FBG) and post-prandial blood glucose (pp) equal to: FBG <126 and pp 151-200, or FBG <126 and pp >200, or FBG >126 and pp >200.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Type 1 diabetes control patients aged 12-32 years
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Unable to understand the insulin pump directions
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has had type 1 diabetes for 11 years and is currently homeless, having lost his supply of insulin. He reports previous episodes of diabetic ketoacidosis.
